npcs.name: Black Sheep
npcs.description: A woolly sheep with a coat of deep black. Docile and steady, it tends to linger at the edges of the flock.

npcs.name: Golden Hen
npcs.description: Plump and bright-feathered, this hen struts proudly around farmyards. Its golden plumage shines in sunlight like ripe wheat.

npcs.name: Willow Deer
npcs.description: A gentle woodland deer, antlers shaped like the curve of willow branches. Moves with grace, pausing often as though listening to whispers in the trees.

npcs.name: Ashen Dove
npcs.description: Soft-feathered dove with pale ash coloring. Carries a mournful coo, often seen near quiet ruins or graveyards.

npcs.name: Stoneback Tortoise
npcs.description: A tortoise with a shell ridged like slabs of stone. Slow but enduring, often found basking in sunlit clearings.

npcs.name: Cinder Sparrow
npcs.description: Tiny bird with dark red plumage. Its chirps are sharp and fast, flitting between hedges like sparks in the wind.

npcs.name: Duskmire Goat
npcs.description: Shaggy goat with curled horns, often found grazing on tough weeds. Known for bleating stubbornly at the worst moments.

npcs.name: Moonlit Owl
npcs.description: Feathers streaked with pale silver, eyes reflecting like coins under moonlight. Hunts silently, a watchful guardian of the night.

npcs.name: Frosttail Hare
npcs.description: Quick-footed hare with a snowy tufted tail. Skittish but hardy, darting through frost and grass alike.

npcs.name: Amber Cow
npcs.description: Broad-bodied and calm, this cowâ€™s coat has an amber sheen. Provides milk with a sweet, nutty flavor prized in villages.

npcs.name: Thornbeak Goose
npcs.description: A loud and territorial goose with a serrated bill. Honks furiously at anything that wanders too close.

npcs.name: Cloudmane Horse
npcs.description: Tall and elegant horse with a flowing pale mane. Known for stamina and a proud, spirited nature.

npcs.name: Silt River Duck
npcs.description: Round-bellied duck with mud-brown plumage. Waddles near riverbanks, quacking noisily as it forages.

npcs.name: Rosefinch
npcs.description: Bright little bird with a breast flushed rose-red. Its song is cheerful, often heard at dawn in spring meadows.

npcs.name: Mire Snail
npcs.description: Large land snail with a shell streaked in greenish muck. Leaves glistening trails along stones after rain.

npcs.name: Hearth Pig
npcs.description: Round and good-natured, this pig often snoozes near fireplaces. Farmers raise them as much for companionship as for meat.

npcs.name: Silver Heron
npcs.description: Tall bird with gleaming silver plumage. Wades gracefully through shallow rivers, spearing fish with uncanny precision.

npcs.name: Dappled Fawn
npcs.description: Young deer with a dappled coat like sunlight through leaves. Shy and delicate, a fleeting presence in the forest.

npcs.name: Copper Rooster
npcs.description: A proud rooster with copper-colored plumage. Struts and crows loudly at the first hint of dawn.

npcs.name: Sunset Swan
npcs.description: Elegant swan with feathers that shimmer orange and red in fading light. Symbol of grace and fleeting beauty.

npcs.name: Velvet Hare
npcs.description: Soft-coated hare whose fur feels like velvet to the touch. Considered a gentle omen of luck.

npcs.name: Bramble Hedgehog
npcs.description: Tiny hedgehog with spines tipped darker like thorn brambles. Shuffles through hedges sniffing for insects.

npcs.name: Dewdrop Calf
npcs.description: Young calf with wide innocent eyes, its nose always damp. Follows people curiously like a lost child.

npcs.name: Mossback Turtle
npcs.description: Small turtle with moss growing across its shell. Slow but persistent, it often looks like a moving stone in streams.

npcs.name: Twilight Dove
npcs.description: Dove with plumage that shifts from gray to violet as evening falls. Its coo carries a calm, soothing note.

npcs.name: Honeybee Swarm
npcs.description: A buzzing cluster of bees, wings shining like amber in sunlight. Though harmless if left alone, their hive is fiercely guarded.

npcs.name: Lantern Firefly
npcs.description: Tiny insect whose abdomen glows bright gold. In fields at night, they light the air like drifting lanterns.

npcs.name: Fallow Stag
npcs.description: A regal stag with branching antlers. Moves with steady authority, often leading smaller herds across glades.

npcs.name: Marsh Egret
npcs.description: Slender white bird stalking marshes for frogs. Its cry is sharp and piercing, echoing across wetlands.

npcs.name: Pine Marten
npcs.description: Quick and curious, this brown-furred weasel-like animal bounds through forests with playful energy.

npcs.name: Cobalt Jay
npcs.description: A bright blue forest bird with a shrill call. Known to steal shiny trinkets left unattended.

npcs.name: Drift Hare
npcs.description: A long-legged hare that bounds across dunes and grassland with great speed. Its sandy coat helps it vanish quickly.

npcs.name: Crown Antelope
npcs.description: An antelope with horn tips shaped like a regal crown. Agile and wary, always on the move through tall grass.

npcs.name: Speckled Pigeon
npcs.description: Plump city-dwelling pigeon with gray feathers speckled white. Familiar sight around markets and temple steps.

npcs.name: Shimmerfin Carp
npcs.description: A river carp whose scales shimmer iridescently under light. Popular in ponds and lucky charms.

npcs.name: Mourning Dove
npcs.description: Soft gray dove with a low, haunting coo. A symbol of remembrance in many villages.

npcs.name: Azure Swan
npcs.description: Majestic swan with feathers of deep blue. A rare sight, admired as a symbol of purity and serenity.

npcs.name: Spice Hen
npcs.description: Farmyard hen with speckled brown plumage. Known for laying eggs with a richer taste, prized in kitchens.

npcs.name: Timber Ox
npcs.description: Massive ox bred for hauling lumber. Its horns are blunt but thick, its gait steady and patient.

npcs.name: Pearl Dove
npcs.description: A small dove with feathers shimmering white like pearls. Associated with peace and new beginnings.
